title: Sylvia Park Screening Was amazing!!!

replies.body:
Hi Lucina,

I'm glad you enjoyed it so much! Any feedback on the event would be great as well., we're always looking to improve on our events. (I was the guy running it and organizing the mini-games etc).

Hope to see you come along to our next one (OPL Split 2 Final). 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Don't forget to like our [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/uoalolclub/) and keep in the loop with league events in Auckland, starting with the "ladies night" and "$20 dollar cosplay party" later this week ♥
Glad you had a great time!
What news is that? We can compete in the Major Tournaments?
